<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next, I can explain to you how to <RED>edit</RED>.
Do you want me to tell you now?
Please tell me
No thanks

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I'll explain it to you. We'll
practice by building a <GREEN>wooden fence</GREEN>.
Take this, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, now I'll explain.
Watch.

To edit, you have to <RED>switch back and
forth between the top and bottom
screens</RED>.

The screen you are looking at now is
the one you see while editing. Notice
that you aren't holding anything.

Editing controls are the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> to
pick up something in front of you, and
the <BLUE>Y Button</BLUE> to return to the studio.

The <BLUE>X Button</BLUE> or <BLUE>touching the
bottom screen</BLUE> switches control to
the bottom screen.

On the bottom screen, you can select
items from your <RED>inventory</RED>,
where amenities are kept. Select the
amenity you want and press the
<BLUE>A Button</BLUE> or touch the Touch Screen.

Once you choose an amenity, you will
be carrying it and control will switch
back to the top screen.

Then, pressing the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> will
set the amenity down.

You can change the direction of the
amenity using the <BLUE>L Button</BLUE> and
<BLUE>R Button</BLUE>.

The area of ground highlighted in blue
shows where the amenity can be placed.
If the ground is highlighted in red,
the amenity cannot be placed.

To put away the amenity you are
holding, press the <BLUE>Y Button</BLUE>.
You <RED>cannot return to the studio</RED>
while carrying something.
<PAGE>
Also, items like houses cannot be
kept in the inventory. If you push the
<BLUE>Y Button</BLUE> to put away such an item
you will <RED>return to your house</RED>.

But don't worry. Even after you return
home, the amenity you were holding
will go back to where it was before.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now why don't you practice actually
placing an amenity?
Put it wherever you want.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Use the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> to place the
wooden fence you are carrying.
Go ahead, <MYNAME>, anywhere you want!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yeah, that seems good!
Nice work!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
But you should put your house, watering
spot and other farm-related amenities on
your farmland houses for people in town.
<PAGE>
Okay, I'll finish up by explaining to
you how <RED>EP (Edit Points)</RED> work.

EP (Edit Points) are calculated when
you place an amenity.

There is an upper limit on EP for each
map area, and if you exceed it, you
<RED>can't place any more amenities there</RED>.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's all I have to explain.
If something comes up that confuses you,
check your <BLUE>bookshelf</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
There are also editing <GREEN>combos</GREEN>.
By placing certain items together you
can obtain <RED>special effects</RED>.
<PAGE>
As you acquire new blueprints, try
placing different amenities around.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And now, as a thank-you for building me
a house, I want to give you this gift.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. You can find an explanation of
editing on your <BLUE>bookshelf</BLUE>.
Consult that if you need help.
<PAGE>
There are also editing <GREEN>combos</GREEN>.
By placing certain items together you
can obtain <RED>special effects</RED>.
<PAGE>
As you acquire new blueprints, try
placing different amenities around.
<PAGE>
And now, as a thank-you for building me
a house, I want to give you this gift.

<SPEED_IMME>
Acquired <GREEN>various blueprints</GREEN>!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everything I've just given you is useful
on your farm, so put them to work!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, it's time for me to get on home.
I have to draw up some more <GREEN>blueprints</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
I only sell blueprints on <BLUE>Wednesday,
Friday and Sunday</BLUE>. I'm off other days.
<PAGE>
My hours are from <BLUE>10 AM to 6 PM</BLUE>.
I'm off to open my shop for today.
Come visit me!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well now, <MYNAME>, make sure you use
your studio a lot!

Right now I'm trying to teach you how
to edit, so hurry up and place the
<GREEN>wooden fence</GREEN>.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can freely relocate amenities,
including houses, on the farm or in
town, so try them in different spots.
